sen.j: 下長者町通（しもちょうじゃまちどおり）は京都市上京区の東西の通りの一つ。
sen.e: Shimochojamachi-dori Street is one of the east and west street in Kamigyo-Ward, Kyoto City.
Shimochojamachi-dori Street is a street runing east-west street in Kamigyo-Ward, Kyoto City.
Shimochojamachi-dori Street is a street runing east-west street in Kamigyo Ward, Kyoto City.

sen.j: 東は烏丸通から西は千本通西入まで。
sen.e: This street runs from Karasuma-dori Street at east to Senbon-dori nishi iru at west.
This street runs from Karasuma-dori Street in the east to Senbon-dori nishi iru in the west.
This street runs from Karasuma-dori Street in the east to Senbon-dori Street nishi-iru in the west.

sen.j: 住宅地の交通量の少ない通りである。
sen.e: The street in residential area with less traffic.
The residential area has minimal traffic.
The residential area has minimal traffic.
